fortune:
The mysterious aura surrounding Steve is quite intriguing. After a deep dive into his subconscious, I've received the following prophecy:

"Steve, you are a master of unpredictable digestive journeys. Your digestive system is a dynamic force, capable of unleashing a gas or a bombshell at any moment. But fear not, for your bodily control is strong – it's just not always in your favor. Heed this warning: those who underestimate your digestive bravery will find themselves on the receiving end of a explosive fart, but also prepare to be showered with a burst of lucky vibes upon witnessing a series of successful poops. You, Steve, are a force to be reckoned with, and your secrets will be revealed in equal measure."
name: Steve
